name: Goong Tod Recipe (Deep Fried Prawns)
description: This goong tod recipe makes delicious deep-fried prawns with tempura flour batter.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, mix tempura flour, salt, white pepper, and flavor seasoning. Gradually add ice-cold water to make a batter.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large mixing bowl, mix tempura flour, salt, white pepper, and flavor seasoning. Gradually add ice-cold water to make a batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a wok or deep-frying pan. Dip a prawn into the batter, then into the breadcrumbs, making sure it's well-coated. Fry the prawn in hot oil until it's golden. Cooking time varies by prawn size. Make sure not to overcook, or prawns will shrink. Serve immediately with a dipping sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a wok or deep-frying pan. Dip a prawn into the batter, then into the breadcrumbs, making sure it's well-coated. Fry the prawn in hot oil until it's golden. Cooking time varies by prawn size. Make sure not to overcook, or prawns will shrink. Serve immediately with a dipping sauce.

keywords: crispy prawns, fried prawns, goong tod
